title: Rbah
author: Rbah
content: Hello guys, I'm new here and I want to askI've always wanted to create a raffle system where people would sign in with metamask and buy ticket each ticket would be around ~$1 and it will be pure based on the blockchain so no rigging or w/eLets say that by the end of the week when the raffle draw 10% of it would be donated to a charity 5% to dev team and the rest it will go to the winnerI'm already developing a concept like that in nodejs I would love to hear any suggestions from youWould it work or Im just wasting my timethanks in advance

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: From what I've seen on Bitcointalk, you're wasting your time. Even EV+ Raffles barely got any players, and EV- is completely ignored. Unless it's for collectible items, those Raffles are popular.

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Expected Value positive or negative. EV+ is usually a promotion that doesn't earn the creator any money.
